Reviews.Title: It is a camera?
Reviews.Author: lege "lege"
Reviews.Content: This camera it not good for any stage of the security system- nor for the beginner nor for middle class system. Spend more money but buy better one.

Reviews.Title: NIGHT VISION DOES NOT WORK AT ALL!!!!!
Reviews.Author: jonathan young
Reviews.Content: night vision does not work at all . this camera was the  replacement for one that lasted six months hope the DVR does not die

Reviews.Title: Definitally not 600TVL
Reviews.Author: Adam S. Travis "Hell Knight Hicks"
Reviews.Content: The night vision on the camera is bad and the picture quality is just as bad.  theres no way this camera is 600TVL  I have 400TVL cameras that look better.I would not reccomend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Good quality for a decent price
Reviews.Author: flava
Reviews.Content: The night vision gives facial recognition to about 50 feet, but you can make out objects further.  Clear, crisp pictures that really compliment the standard night owl cameras for wider views.  Do not plan on seeing anything within three feet of the camera though.

Reviews.Title: Misleading - Bad Product
Reviews.Author: Shawn Alford
Reviews.Content: Seriously? I bought 2 of these to replace the default cameras that came with the 4 Camera Channel Bundle (Apollo DVR5 to get better field of view. This is accomplished for daytime use, but Night Vision, you can hang it up. The quality of resolution and night vision clarity is horrible. It's worse than the default cameras I was hoping to improve upon. Don't bother calling support either. I also purchased a PT-SH420-24 CCD Pan/Tilt Camera from them that I have had problems with. The person I spoke to on the phone had to go talk to the Tech Guru of the Company apparently for every basic feature of what is there STANDARD DVR Model. Still didn't fix my problem. Oh 24/7 Support? Whatever. I sent an email 3 - 4 Days ago. Nothing. I still haven't heard anything back from them.

Reviews.Title: nice camera
Reviews.Author: patrick reinholdt
Reviews.Content: works great easy setup nice picture all i could ask for price was good no problems i would tell my friends

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: F. OHalloran "luckyme"
Reviews.Content: For the money. It's great. It has a wider view and a closer view than the ones that came with my 4 camera box set. By Night Owl. I use this camera for out side. That can see both sides of my barn from about 75' away. And full view of my drive way in between my house and barn.

Reviews.Title: good value for the money
Reviews.Author: C. Farley
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these, replaces a $80 Sony that quit in less than a year.  Daytime pictures are clear with good color and night time works fine on a normal moon lit night I can see front of 3 car garage about 60' away from camera.  Totally dark night I can still make out forms.  Am purchasing one more and when the walmart camera burns out will probably replace with night owl.  All four cameras connected to a Q-see dvr.

Reviews.Title: night owl cam-ov600-365 hi-resolution 600 tvl-security camera
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: They work great.Great night vision.Bought 2 of a different brand to start with and the night owl puts them to shame.Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Allan Ray Thomas Sr.
Reviews.Content: Camera works well during the day, however, night vision does not work as well. Overall good purchase for the price.

Reviews.Title: Don't bother
Reviews.Author: Outrigger
Reviews.Content: I've purchased a total of 4 of these cameras, 2 from Amazon 2 from Ebay.  The 2 from Ebay worked day and night with proper color, the 1 from Amazon and the replacement from Amazon displayed video loss at night.  Contacted Night Owl and was told, there are products that work better then others.  For just day time they work fine, at night don't waste your time.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy
Reviews.Author: Edward Lasinski
Reviews.Content: This product is defected.  Piece of crap! I don't want it cause it is different from your advertisement. It sucks

Reviews.Title: nightowl camera
Reviews.Author: pedro
Reviews.Content: Night vission do not work you do not see anything at night i got others night owl camera that worked a lot better.

Reviews.Title: High Quality
Reviews.Author: Tball
Reviews.Content: I bought these to upgrade my cameras for my system and they are very clear with decent night vision.  If your looking to upgrade from the lower Night Owl camera it is worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Camera did not work after dark
Reviews.Author: Wise Shooper
Reviews.Content: Right out of the box the camera did not work at night, it displayed "video loss".on the DVR.The daylight picture was fine.I contacted Night Owl and was told I had to pay shipping to return the defective product to them.I contacted Amazon and they sent me a pre-paid shipping label and issued me a full refund.Save yourself a hassle, DO NOT BUY NIGHT OWL PRODUCTS!

ProductInfo.Features:
Hi-Resolution Security Camera
600 TV Lines Resolution for Clear Crisp Images
100 Feet Night Vision with 50 Feet of Night Vision
3-Axis Vandal Proof Cable System
24/7 Technical Phone Support
ProductInfo.Name: Night Owl Security CAM-OV600-365 Hi-Resolution 600 TVL Security Camera with 36 Cobalt Blue LED
